channel.title: How do I make beer barrells on Lost Realm 718
channel.description: How do I make the beer barrells on Lost Realm 718 using construction so I can get my completionist cape? Does anyone know? Some reason I can't add rooms to the player owned house and it only lets me make a prayer alter.
